cyclone.name: IDA
cyclone.current_location: about 50 miles NNW of Grand Cayman and 145 miles SE of the Isle of Youth
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to continue northwest, cross western Cuba today, enter the central Gulf of Mexico Saturday, and accelerate north-northwest toward the northern Gulf Coast (southeast Louisiana–Mississippi coast) by Sunday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeast Louisiana/northern Gulf Coast (near the mouth of the Mississippi River)
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: N/A (system not forecast to track offshore of Boston, MA within 5-day window)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Cameron, LA to the Mississippi/Alabama border including Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas and metropolitan New Orleans; Tropical Storm Watch Mississippi/Alabama border to Alabama/Florida border; Storm-Surge Watch Sabine Pass TX eastward to the Alabama/Florida border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning Cayman Islands and the Cuban provinces of Matanzas, Mayabeque, Havana, Artemisa, Pinar del Rio, and Isle of Youth
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Western Cuba today; entire northern Gulf Coast from Texas/LA border eastward to the Alabama/Florida border Sunday–Monday
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: No Boston-area entry in advisory #3 wind-probability table
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at Boston, MA within 5-day forecast window
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds anticipated at Boston, MA through Day-5
weather_observation.rainfall: At most remnant rainfall possible around 1–2 in. late next week; heavy rainfall not indicated
